entries.content: Shift from trying to convince the prospect to buy, to determining if you *should* sell to them.
Present alternative solutions the prospect could pursue (e.g., raise prices, fire/hire staff, outsource) and make them justify why they *cannot* do those alternatives.
entries.notes: Used to get the prospect to convince you they need your solution by eliminating other options.

entries.content: Flip the dynamic: The prospect needs to convince you they need your solution, will spend the money, and will put in the time required.
entries.notes: Sets conditions on the sale based on the buyer's justification and commitment.

entries.content: I'm here to figure out if I should sell to you.
You need to convince me I should sell to you.

focus_area: Handling "Think About It": "What specifically?", Conditional closing
